column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////For the spicy tonkotsu
column2: the broth was thick and good. I love it. The noodle was a little too hard for my taste. Didn't like it as much. It comes with "wood ear"
column4: and I had to add an extra egg ($1) for it. The egg wasn't seasoned
column5: which is fine I guess.. :P I like Ninja Ramen's egg alot.
